data.title: King Ludwig I von Bayern (August 25, 1786 â€“ February 29, 1868)
data.meta_description: Ludwig I was the second king of Bavaria.  In October 1810, Ludwig married Therese of Saxe-Hildburghausen. The wedding was the occasion of the first ever Oktoberfest.  The Walhalla temple was Ludwig s idea and one of his many cultural projects for Bavaria.
data.text: Ludwig I was the second king of Bavaria. In October 1810, Ludwig married Therese of Saxe-Hildburghausen. The wedding was the occasion of the first ever Oktoberfest. The Walhalla temple was Ludwig s idea and one of his many cultural projects for Bavaria.
